column1: 43930492$Magical Something$$DARK$[Spellcaster/effect]$$$$$4$1800$1300$$$$Each time a Spell Card is activated
column2: place 1 Spell Counter on this card when that Spell resolves. This card's Level is increased by the number of Spell Counters on it. You can remove 3 Spell Counters from this card
column3: then target 1 Quick-Play Spell in your GY; Set that card to your Spell & Trap Zone. You can only use this effect of "Magical Something" once per turn.$$$$$
